attributes.action: No change of use consent for Manston Airport
attributes.additional_details: All permissions for change of use at Manston Airport should be rejected. Manston should remain an airport generating local jobs. If necessary a compulsory purchase order (cost prices to current owner plus interest at current Bank of England base rate) should be made for the whole airport and ownership transferred to an organisation that will run Manston as an airport and not seek to profit at the expense of other people's jobs.
